output: html_document
---

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    error = FALSE,
    tidy  = FALSE,
    message = FALSE,
    eval = FALSE,
    fig.align = "center")
```


**rGREAT** has not yet been available on Bioconductor release branch (will be on around Octorber this year). Reviewers can
install **rGREAT** from GitHub:

```{r}
library(devtools)
install_github("jokergoo/rGREAT")
```


The new version of **rGREAT** is also available on Bioconductor development branch, which can be installed by :

```{r}
BiocManager::install(version='devel')
```
